column2: A stone infused with gods gift, you feel protected
You did it despite what the gods told you.
A stone infused with life itself, it enjoy your company.
The power of love scream around you.
It's trying to mimic other stones but lacks substance.
The stone phases through your hands strangely.
The slime appears to have stabilised it.
The magic inside is too unstable.
The Gods respect you for having it.
You wonder if it's really a stone ?
You don't want to hold it.\nIt is dangerous and must be purified.
This tiny rock looks like it can melt your bones, but when touched only a very pleasant warmth can be felt.
Something is happening inside, it will take some time.\nYou should keep it.
The Black Work is complete. Matter dissolves into void.
The White Work is complete. Purity achieved.
Your soul is not yet pure enough.
The Yellow Work is complete. The awakening achieved.
The sun has not yet risen for you.
The Red Work is complete. The marriage of opposites achieved.
Perfection requires the union of all knowledge.
The Gods are afraid of what you're trying to do.
Brutaly merge multiple stone in a large radius.
Bury that which bears the Mark of Elements deep within the Purifying Powder...\nLet it be completely engulfed, hidden from sight.\nWhat cleanses around purges what lies inside.

The Fluid that Mimics observes what surrounds it...
Place the Purified within, and nearby, a Vessel filled.
What is Near shall be Carried, what Bathes shall be Changed.
The Imitator becomes Messenger between Container and Stone...
"Four must become One through violent convergence...\nFire
column5: Lightning - collide them brutally.\nFrom Chaos emerges the Quintessence
column6:
the Fifth Element.

This Perfect Essence refines its lesser forms...
With it Imperfection ascends to Perfection."

column2:
Infuse a stone with the blue thing that disappears quickly.
With that, the fusion can begin.
You can only move forward by understanding the world and its rules.
Just as liquids mix, stones fuse, but sometimes stones need a catalyst.
You will be halfway there when you have it.
You chose to let the lies fool you.
The stone is now strong enough to let you use the magic whithin.
The Gods can't hide it anymore.
You're halfway.\nYou can now access the Gods secrets.
You need to understand the truth and avoid the lies.
Bees reveal their secrets to you.
Bees don't lie, why would they?
Bees have already revealed their secrets to you.
